item.title: Connect Azure Databricks to a DevOps repo in a different tenancy
item.description: If you’re working with a large multi-tenancy organisation it’s possible the subscription your Databricks resource sits in is a different tenancy to the Azure DevOps hosting your repositories. This blog explains how to connect Databricks to a DevOps repository in that scenario. When trying to connect to DevOps in a seperate tenancy, you’ll receive the message Unable to parse credentials from Azure Active Directory account. Ensure Azure Devops account is connected to AAD.
